(4) We can ask him to share the burden with the trust funds
that is, to contribute 6*45 per cent fron his salary, while we put in 6.45
per cent froa the trust. Question* is this saving of ยง145 worth it?
I should like to know from you, as president of MSB and chair-
man of this committee, which of these alternatives you want me to follow.
Very best wishes!
Sincerely yours,
Wilbur Schram
Dean
